name: Solidex Joint Provider
description: Supplies {{token}} to a [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) Stable Pool to earn SOLID and SEX. Earned tokens are harvested, divided between the pair, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Solidex Joint Provider
en.description: Supplies {{token}} to a [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) Stable Pool to earn SOLID and SEX. Earned tokens are harvested, divided between the pair, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Solidex Joint Provider
fr.description: Fournit du {{token}} sur une pool stable [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) pour gagner des jetons SOLID et SEX. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie.

es.name: Solidex Joint Provider
es.description: Suministra {{token}} a un grupo estable de [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) para ganar SOLID y SEX. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se dividen entre el par, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

de.name: Solidex Joint Provider
de.description: Supplies {{token}} to a [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) Stable Pool to earn SOLID and SEX. Earned tokens are harvested, divided between the pair, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

el.description: Supplies {{token}} to a [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) Stable Pool to earn SOLID and SEX. Earned tokens are harvested, divided between the pair, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

tr.name: Solidex Joint Provider
tr.description: SOLID ve SEX kazanmak için bir [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) Stable Havuzuna {{token}} sağlar. Kazanılan jetonlar hasat edilir, çiftler arasında bölünür, daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır ve stratejiye geri yatırılır.

vi.name: Solidex Joint Provider
vi.description: Supplies {{token}} to a [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) Stable Pool to earn SOLID and SEX. Earned tokens are harvested, divided between the pair, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Solidex Joint Provider
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) 的稳定池以赚取 SOLID 和 SEX 奖励。收获到的代币会被分配给交易对的两个代币，然后卖掉，换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Solidex Joint Provider
hi.description: SOLID और SEX कमाने के लिए {{token}} को [Solidex Finance](https://solidexfinance.com/#/pools) Stable Pool में सप्लाई करता है। अर्जित टोकन वसूल किया जाता है, जोड़ी के बीच विभाजित किया जाता है, और अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
